summary: Yet another Shield mod. Light armor. With some touch of immersive at the first person view mode. Is so empty at the inner side of the shield's isn't it? Nature abhors a vacuum.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[i]
[img]https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2L18bcY6oEM/V63LuLrreDI/AAAAAAAAEBU/v-v-Ygph178Gx2pMHTYQ551fasL7950vgCLcB/s1600/titul_RS_X_trns.png[/img]
[size=3]
[img]https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sX8vPcFDQwU/V63Wp5m_gnI/AAAAAAAAEB0/Qe-9l_wJlg4Uo4PMFOUQCYZa9fUQRVzewCLcB/s1600/description_plate.png[/img]

Here is [/size][/i][i][size=3]craftable[/size][/i][i][size=3] and [/size][/i][i][size=3]upgradeable[/size][/i][i][size=3] round wicker shields in 4 variations.[/size][/i][/center][center][i][size=3]

[/size]
[img]https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-E5dLRzqzK1g/V63V0raw9EI/AAAAAAAAEBo/l7dgml4cXu4Ykt5zTBG6kTHtTACkfmAQgCLcB/s1600/stats_plate.png[/img]
         
          [b]"Quick Access" Versions:[/b]
[/i][i]~weight:6[/i][i]
[/i][i]            ~armor raiting: 30 [/i][i]

[b]"Clean" Versions:[/b]
~weight: 3
           ~armor raiting: 30



[img]https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dtm2E8ZVZ4o/V6yGdiL3ALI/AAAAAAAAD-U/LTTjnP8irCsyyrxRJEMkCbxvCuVnp3gRwCLcB/s1600/how2obtain_plate_RS.png[/img]
[/i][size=3]
Craft it or use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]~additem[/url][/size][size=3]
[/size][/center]

[i][center][img]https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wERrdUa7K0o/V63Cu0wOcCI/AAAAAAAAEA4/9EUU5mkNfuIjcmhIHl6_Jpi0-TLdvisMQCLcB/s1600/recomendations_plate_s.png[/img][/center][/i][center][size=3][i]If you want bottles exactly like on screenies you must use [/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62701/?]Rustic Potions and Poisons[/url] [i]by [/i][/size][b][size=3][i]Gamwich

[/i][/size][/b][/center][center]

[size=2][b][i][u]

[url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/5277424-excinerus/]
[/url][size=4]I use here a model of Bomb from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69306/?]"Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul"[/url] mod
and model of [url=https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/35770-2-1367934791.jpg]"BloodThorn"[/url] from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35770/?]"Unique Weapons Redone"[/url]  mod with permission.
